articles.author: Loveday Morris, Susannah George
articles.title: Arab leaders scramble for alternative to Trump’s Gaza proposal - The Washington Post
articles.description: The emerging Arab plan is likely to call for Palestinian technocrats to govern Gaza and billions to be spent on reconstruction, without removing Gazan residents.
articles.content: President Donald Trumps plan to remove Palestinians from the Gaza Strip and create a real estate riviera on the eastern Mediterranean has spurred a regional scramble for an alternative, with Arab lea… [+8210 chars]

articles.title: NASA’s Webb Telescope Reveals a Never-Ending Cosmic Firestorm at the Center of the Milky Way - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Observations revealed ongoing fireworks featuring short bursts and longer flares. Imagine solar flares, but magnified to an unimaginable scale — a continuous sparkle bright enough to shine across 26,000 light-years of space. Scattered among these glimmering f…
articles.content: This artist’s concept portrays the supermassive black hole at the center of the Milky Way galaxy, known as Sagittarius A* (A-star). It’s surrounded by a swirling accretion disk of hot gas. The black … [+8188 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Texas measles outbreak reaches 90 cases; 9 cases in New Mexico - Ars Technica
articles.description: The Texas cases are largely in children. Sixteen cases have been hospitalized.
